DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate use AngioGuard™ device combine Bx Velocity™ patient outcome one month .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Evaluate Patient Outcome Using Distal Protection Combined With BX Velocity .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , multi-center trial . Patients treat AngioGuard™ device Bx Velocity™ stent follow six-months post-procedure .
DOC.criteria: Unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald classification B & C , IIIIII , native vessel ) lesion locate SVG ; Single de novo restenotic lesion require treatment major native coronary artery saphenous vein graft ; The vessel diameter place AngioGuard™ device must > 3 < 5.5 mm ( 6.5 7mm AngioGuard™ available ) ; Target lesion stenosis > 50 % < 100 % ( TIMI 1 ) . A Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction within precede 72 hour unless CK CKMB enzymes back normal ; More one coronary artery 100 % occlude ; Patient unprotected leave main coronary disease > 50 % stenosis ; Patient ostial target lesion ; Significant ( > 50 % ) untreated stenosis proximal distal target lesion treat procedure , since may require revascularization impede runoff ; Ejection fraction < 30 % ; Totally occlude vessel ( TIMI 0 Level ) .
